document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Physician? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">say </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">heal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Medicine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Posthumous </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">unavailable </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Exchequer? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">speak </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">owe </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">negotiation </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Party </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Is heaven a physician?
